VerbatimNode - simple inline code
.
This is `inline code` in a paragraph.
.
This is `inline code` in a paragraph.
.

DeleteNode - strikethrough text
.
This is {-deleted-} text.
.
This is {-deleted-} text.
.

InsertNode - inserted text
.
This is {+inserted+} text.
.
This is {+inserted+} text.
.

HighlightedNode - marked text
.
This is {=highlighted=} text.
.
This is {=highlighted=} text.
.

SubscriptNode - subscript
.
Chemical formula: H{~2~}O
.
Chemical formula: H{~2~}O
.

SuperscriptNode - superscript
.
Mathematical expression: x{^2^} + y{^2^}
.
Mathematical expression: x{^2^} + y{^2^}
.

LineBreakNode - hard line break
.
First line\
Second line
.
First line\
Second line
.

ImageNode - simple image
.
![A photo](image.png)
.
![A photo](image.png)
.

ImageNode - image with empty alt text
.
![](logo.svg)
.
![](logo.svg)
.

SymbolsNode - emoji
.
Hello :smile: world
.
Hello :smile: world
.

Combined inline formatting
.
This paragraph has *bold*, _italic_, `code`, {-deleted-}, {+inserted+}, {=highlighted=}, subscript H{~2~}O, superscript x{^2^}, and [a link](https://example.com).
.
This paragraph has *bold*, _italic_, `code`, {-deleted-}, {+inserted+}, {=highlighted=}, subscript H{~2~}O, superscript x{^2^}, and [a link](https://example.com).
.

Nested inline formatting
.
This is *bold with _nested italic_ text*.
.
This is *bold with _nested italic_ text*.
.

VerbatimNode - code with single backtick
.
This is `` code`with`backtick `` in text.
.
This is `` code`with`backtick `` in text.
.

VerbatimNode - code with double backticks
.
This is ``` code``double`` ``` in text.
.
This is ``` code``double`` ``` in text.
.

VerbatimNode - code starting with backtick
.
This is `` `start `` in text.
.
This is `` `start `` in text.
.

VerbatimNode - code ending with backtick
.
This is `` end` `` in text.
.
This is `` end` `` in text.
.

Emphasis with class
.
_italic_{.highlight}
.
_italic_{ .highlight }
.

Strong with id
.
*bold*{#header}
.
*bold*{ #header }
.

Link with attributes
.
[text](url){.link-class}
.
[text](url){ .link-class }
.

Span with multiple attributes
.
[text]{.class1 .class2 #myid key="value"}
.
[text]{ .class1 .class2 #myid key="value" }
.
